member.name: M:CMS.Automation.TriggerHelper.ProcessTriggersInternal(CMS.Automation.TriggerOptions)
member.summary: Processes all triggers of given type on given BaseInfo.

member.name: T:CMS.Automation.TriggerOptions
member.summary: Crate for passing variables needed by triggers.

member.name: F:CMS.Automation.TriggerOptions.Info
member.summary: Info to add to process. Required field.

member.name: F:CMS.Automation.TriggerOptions.ObjectType
member.summary: Allowed object type of workflow process that trigger would start. Required field.

member.name: F:CMS.Automation.TriggerOptions.Resolver
member.summary: Resolver on which macros of triggers will be resolved.

member.name: F:CMS.Automation.TriggerOptions.Types
member.summary: Allowed types of triggers to be processed. Leave empty to process all types of triggers.

member.name: F:CMS.Automation.TriggerOptions.PassFunction
member.summary: Function that must be passed to process trigger.

member.name: F:CMS.Automation.TriggerOptions.AdditionalData
member.summary: The additional data for trigger that will be available in trigger via TriggerParameters[TRIGGER_DATA]
